alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gulf, south central Liberty and Franklin Counties through 530 PM EDT/430 PM CDT/... At 457 PM EDT/357 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Apalachicola, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St George Island, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Nine Mile, Buck Siding, Royal Bluff, High Bluff, St George Island St Pk, Tilton, Beverly, Green Point, Owens Bridge, Bay City, Sumatra, Howard Creek, Apalachicola Airport, Creels, Hays Place and Fort Gadsden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
